name: Badlands (itch) (WizWaz)
description:
This is my Scream Jam 2021 submission.

A procedurally generated environment with atmospheric effects and endless zombies for you to kill.

You are in an apocalyptic wasteland where you have to survive by killing zombies.

Controls

  • Please refer "Input Manager" screenshot for controls

Features

  • Procedurally Generated Environment with buildings, broken down cars, and other objects
  • Lightning, fog, smoke, and other effects
  • A lot of zombies to kill
  • A lot of weapons to pickup
  • Blood splatter effects
  • Various sound effects
  • Day-Night transition

Known Bugs

  • Issues in Navmesh due to the generation of procedural environment
  • Zombies flicker since the Navmesh is generated dynamically
  • When you die, you are respawned but the previous body is still visible for a short period of time.
